review: Arrived quickly and very simple to set up. Would like to see more apps for channels that we currently watch like AMC, NatGeo and TNT. There are tons of movies and music to choose from between Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu and many more.
author: Barbara

review: I love the options that the fire TV Stick provides for Netflix, Prime Instant Video, TwitchTV, and the many streaming options out there. The problem that I'm having though is that the TV Stick will periodically stop working on my WiFi network, all other devices continue working as intended.  I thought it may have something to do with the Xbox 360, Wii, and or DirecTV Genie being nearby, but even with the other wireless devices turned off the TV Stick will still drop the connection, the wireless router is in the next room with a single wall between them.Otherwise, happy with the purchase.
author: Kenneth R. Martin

review: Requires a power supply.  I know there's a model that doesn't.  Very disappointed about it not being mobile at all.  Can't use it without plugging it into a USB power cord, plugged into an outlet.  Can't use it with a laptop for this reason without using up 2 USB ports and having a 5ft cord in your way.  False advertising in my opinion.
author: daniel r kline

review: I love Amazon anyway, but I love their products and Fire Stick is awesome. Had a bit of a problem and had to unplug the cord and plug it in after 30 seconds..worked great. Customer support is awesome . I recommend the Fire Stick to all my friends and anyone interested in streaming movies, games, and music, via your T.V.
author: L. Richter "Redheart"

review: Love it, way better than Chromecast.  If the remote just had volume control we'd be set.

review: I had to factory reset the device 4x in the last month, each time because the device says their is no network connections. I have multiple wireless devices (even the Echo) using the same network and working just fine, but the Fire TV Stick continues to give me error message regarding bad connection.
